thread.title: Prague astronomical clock, the oldest of its kind, is 605 years old
thread.title_full: Prague astronomical clock, the oldest of its kind, is 605 years old

author: Rhiannon Williams
title: Prague astronomical clock, the oldest of its kind, is 605 years old
text: Google Doodle Prague astronomical clock, the oldest of its kind, is 605 years old Prague's astronomical clock is more than half a millennium old, and is the oldest functional clock of its kind in the world. Google has celebrated its anniversary with a Google Doodle Prague's astronomical clock has turned 605 years old
